title: Provider duty: report serious incidents to market surveillance authorities (with timelines)

legal_consequence.verbatim: Providers of high-risk AI systems placed on the Union market shall report any serious incident to the market surveillance authorities of the Member States where that incident occurred.

items.label: Timelines
items.text: Report immediately after establishing a causal link or its reasonable likelihood, and in any event ≤15 days; widespread infringement or serious incident (49(b)) immediately, ≤2 days; in the event of death, immediately or ≤10 days.

items.label: Initial incomplete report allowed
items.text: An initial incomplete report may be submitted, followed by a complete report.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
